about:
Caitlin was born and raised on the east end of Long Island, NY, where she would sing, dance, and act for her stuffed animals, family, and neighbors in the backyard. Her mom even started a summer theater camp called, Backyard Theatre, which Caitlin now co-directs if sheâ€™s not on the road performing!

Caitlin went on to earn a BFA in Musical Theatre from Pace University in Manhattan. Post-graduation, she's been fortunate enough to tour and perform in regional venues across the country. When not performing, she is a freelance Wellness Advocate with doTERRA, an essential oils company, and is based in NYC where she lives happily with her boyfriend, Christopher and their mini pin, Kya!

posts.content: Caitlin is the headline singer for Titanic's Spectacular Fireworks Display In Tennessee!
Caitlin will be playing Lucy in the national tour of A Charlie Brown Christmas!
